title: Slow Cooker Chicken with Stuffing Recipe
description: This chicken and stuffing crockpot recipe is delicious. Just add chicken, stuffing mix, and cream of chicken soup into a slow cooker for an easy meal.

Slow Cooker Chicken with Stuffing 4.0 (136) 106 Reviews 14 Photos A chicken and stuffing crockpot recipe is always delicious and easy. Great to come home to a fully cooked meal that's ready to eat straight from the slow cooker! Submitted by Beth Charnock Updated on September 6, 2022 Save Rate Print Share Close Add Photo 14 14 14 14 Prep Time: 5 mins Cook Time: 7 hrs Total Time: 7 hrs 5 mins Servings: 4 Jump to Nutrition Facts Cook Mode (Keep screen awake) Ingredients 1x 2x 4x Oops! Something went wrong. Our team is working on it. Original recipe (1X) yields 4 servings 4 skinless, boneless chicken breasts 1 cup chicken broth 1 (10.5 ounce) can cream of chicken soup 1 (6 ounce) box stuffing mix ½ cup water Directions Place chicken into the bottom of a slow cooker. Pour broth over chicken. Mix soup, stuffing mix, and water in a bowl; spoon on top of chicken. Cook in the slow cooker on Low for 7 hours. I Made It Print 331 home cooks made it! Nutrition Facts (per serving) 356 Calories 8g Fat 38g Carbs 30g Protein Show Full Nutrition Label Hide Full Nutrition Label Nutrition Facts Servings Per Recipe 4 Calories 356 % Daily Value * Total Fat 8g 11% Saturated Fat 2g 12% Cholesterol 69mg 23% Sodium 1466mg 64% Total Carbohydrate 38g 14% Dietary Fiber 1g 5% Total Sugars 4g Protein 30g 59% Vitamin C 0mg 0% Calcium 63mg 5% Iron 3mg 17% Potassium 290mg 6% * Percent Daily Values are based on a 2,000 calorie diet. Your daily values may be higher or lower depending on your calorie needs. ** Nutrient information is not available for all ingredients. Amount is based on available nutrient data. (-) Information is not currently available for this nutrient. If you are following a medically restrictive diet, please consult your doctor or registered dietitian before preparing this recipe for personal consumption. Add Your Photo Photos of Slow Cooker Chicken with Stuffing 01 of 14 Photo by  Lauren Stalus Kiefer 02 of 14 Photo by  HotSpud1215 01/13/2025 Easy to follow I love chicken and stuffing and I absolutely love a throw in the crockpot dinner on my way to work. This did not disappoint! 03 of 14 Photo by  Cyndie E 12/10/2020 I absolutely loved this and so did my fussy family! I followed other reviews advice and diced up carrots (4 baby carrots), onion (1/2 medium) and celery (1 stalk) and put on the bottom of the crockpot. I seasoned the chicken with salt, pepper, garlic powder and cayenne pepper (because I like a little “kick”) and placed on top of the vegetables. And I used unsalted chicken stock because other reviewers said it tended to be salty. It was wonderful!! Thank you for the recipe! 04 of 14 Photo by  Wendi Garland 11/17/2020 05 of 14 Photo by  franz008 10/06/2020 06 of 14 Photo by  Chris Pollock 12/19/2018 07 of 14 Photo by  kathy 09/17/2018 I make this the only thing I did do a few things different. I spray my criock pot with Pam then put 1 1/2 Tablespoon iof butter of the crock pot cooked on high until butter melted. Then lightly brown my chicken. 08 of 14 Photo by  Rosey De Mc 12/07/2016 09 of 14 Photo by  Nicki 11/20/2016 It was super easy to put together. However, I find myself wondering what to add to this dish because it's pretty bland even though a bit salty in flavor. Maybe needs more stuffing? 10 of 14 Photo by  Lauren Stalus Kiefer 03/14/2016 1 2 Next You’ll Also Love Quick Chicken and Stuffing Casserole 54 Ratings Swiss Chicken Casserole I 579 Ratings Swiss Chicken Casserole 1,404 Ratings One-Dish Chicken and Stuffing Bake 77 Ratings Quick Bruschetta Chicken Bake 735 Ratings Quick and Easy Chicken and Stuffing Casserole 64 Ratings Slow Cooker Hawaiian Chicken 125 Ratings Golfer's Chicken in the Slow Cooker 33 Ratings Cheesy Chicken Broccoli Bake 29 Ratings Juicy Slow Cooker Chicken Breast For Any Diet 41 Ratings Gravy Stuffing Chicken Bake 50 Ratings Slow Cooker Buffalo Chicken Sandwiches 2,549 Ratings Easy Shredded Chicken 2 Ratings Aunt Jewel's Chicken Dressing Casserole 377 Ratings Honey-Chipotle Chicken 14 Ratings White Wine Broccoli Casserole 36 Ratings Allrecipes Newsletters Follow Us Dinners Meals Ingredients Occasions Cuisines Kitchen Tips News Features About Us Editorial Process Privacy Policy Product Vetting Terms of Service Advertise Careers Contact Your Privacy Choices   Allrecipes is part of the Dotdash Meredith publishing family. name: Beth Charnock
instructions: Place chicken into the bottom of a slow cooker. Pour broth over chicken.;Mix soup, stuffing mix, and water in a bowl; spoon on top of chicken.;Cook in the slow cooker on Low for 7 hours.
